snippet.title: Remedium - First Trailer
snippet.description:
Remedium on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1659090/REMEDIUM/

The fast-paced twin-stick shooter game in the grim post-apocalyptic Renaissance setting.
It had been more than a hundred years since the terrible plague devoured the whole Europe and turned almost everyone there in the maddened mutants. Only a few survivors managed to find refuge behind the huge walls of the fortress-cities. Although you are one of them, your luck has run out as you got infected while foraging outside the city walls. Now your only hope is to fight through the hordes of mutants and chimeras and to find the cure!

#Remedium #trailer #indiegames
